name: tm43
effect: Teaches Secret Power to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Flame Charge to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV & III: Secret Power Gen II: Detect Gen I: Sky Attack)

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: Adds an effect to attack depending on the location.
flavor_text.emerald: Adds an effect to attack depending on the location.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: An attack that may have an additional effect that varies with the terrain.
